summary: VERY DIFFICULT TO TIGHTEN CAR SEAT HARNESS STRAPS ON BRITAX MARATHON CAR SEAT DUE TO POOR MANUFACTURER DESIGN ON METAL HINGE ROUTING ON AUG-DEC 2002 MODELS. THIS WAS CHANGED ON 2003 MODELS, BUT BRITAX HAS NOT TAKEN RESPONSIBILITY NOR CORRECTIVE ACTION FOR 2002 MODELS. SEE MESSAGE BOARD FOR BABY BARGAINS AT WINDSOR PEAK.COM TO READ NUMEROUS COMPLAINTS ON THIS ISSUE. *JB
